name: reci-pro-cate
description:
reci-pro-cate (reciprocate)

a 2D game like the classic "brick breaker" but with a twist! you can slow time to dodge the enemy bullets while bouncing back the ball and once the "RECIPROCATE POWER" is full you can maneuver the ball.

-------------------------------------------------------------

 im kinda new in unity and c# language, im trying to learn physics so please support me by downloading the apk file (look for bugs or you can donate if you want). or by sending me feedbacks to improve the gameplay or the game itself. 

i want to pursue game development by creating small games like this. 

please dont make it flop. :( 

currently working on PC/HTML version of the game, will upload soon.
